long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a powerful Google extension designed to streamline the process of creating proposals for Upwork job descriptions with just a single click. This extension revolutionizes the way proposals are generated by enabling a seamless workflow. Once the extension is enabled, a convenient button appears on the proposal interface. Upon clicking the button, a proposal is automatically generated based on the relevant information extracted from the job description, providing a time-saving and efficient solution.
